ledger.explanationTimeline: This timeline shows how each decision is tracked and later verified.
ledger.explanationIntentOutcome: Declared intent is compared with the observed outcome. Alignment means the decision matched the stated policy.
ledger.explanationReasonGraph: The reason graph shows how premises, rules, and conclusions connect. Each decision can be traced back to its logic.
ledger.explanationAudit: Audit readiness indicates whether every decision has a complete proof bundle (Reason Graph, Proof of Intent, signatures, and temporal order) for external verification.
